data.title: Provider Portal Access
data.meta_description: Sign in to your EmblemHealth provider portal or register for access.
data.text:
Based on the information you provided, we will do one of the following:

Let you know who the Administrator/Office Manager is that is authorized to set up an account for you.

If you indicated that you work for a billing company, have an account, and need additional Tax IDs added to it, we will make that update for you.

If your Tax ID’s Administrator/Office Manager needs to be replaced, we will make that update for you.

If the Tax ID does not have an account, we will send you a Registration Code within three to five business days. To register your account on the provider portal sign-in page, you will need your Registration Code and NPI number. Once the master account is set up, your Administrator/Office Manager will be able to set up additional portal users.

Until Your Account Is Created or Updated

If you need to confirm a member’s eligibility, request a preauthorization, find the status of a claim, etc. before the account is set up, please use our interactive voice response systems:

EmblemHealth: 866-447-9717

ConnectiCare Commercial: 800-828-3407
